column1: What will you be doing in your role at Ciena?

We are looking for a testing and automation focused software engineer to drive quality improvements in the Blue Planet Orchestration Resource Adapter Software Development Kit (RA-SDK) and supporting micro-services and libraries. You will:
Write software that exercises the capabilities exposed by the RA-SDK libraries
column3: and micro-services and stresses them in step with our most demanding customers

column1: Improve overall test-coverage and quality measurement driving toward faster and more confident software delivery
Develop test harnesses
Use software engineering knowledge to find ways to break software and expose vulnerabilities to race conditions
Create large scale system tests to drive improvements in scalability
Work closely with the Blue Planet solution teams
column3: and customers to support their use of the platform to deliver complete solutions to customers

column1: Participate in all phases of an agile development cycle
Areas of impact:

You will be working as a Blue Planet software test engineer responsible for assuring quality in the RA-SDK and supporting software libraries and services. Quality improvements in the RA-SDK translate to:
Improved quality and customer satisfaction for all Blue Planet solutions
Greater efficiency for the development team by finding problems earlier and in controlled environments
Simpler and faster resource adapter development
Test patterns and automation that can be leveraged by all resource adapter developers

The goal of the RA-SDK is to allow the resource adapter author to focus primarily on the unique details of a specific device type or domain while relying on common abstractions and behaviors provided by the RA-SDK.
